program_name: Single Family Housing Repair Loans and Grants
program_purpose_loans: To repair, improve, or modernize homes for very-low-income homeowners
program_purpose_grants: To remove health and safety hazards for elderly, very-low-income homeowners
eligible_area_description: Properties must be located in an eligible rural area
funds_use_loans: Repair, improve, or modernize homes, or to remove health and safety hazards
grant_repayment_condition: If property is sold in less than three years
application_deadline: Available year-round as long as funding is available
application_processing: Processed in the order they are received
governing_program_1_name: The Housing Act of 1949 as amended; 7 CFR, Part 3550
governing_program_2_name: HB-1-3550 - Direct Single Family Housing Program Field Office Handbook
note_equal_opportunity_statement: USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender
